fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.genealgorithms.polygon

Class SquareAlignPolygons

  • Object
    • SquareAlignPolygons

  • public class SquareAlignPolygons
extends Object
    Implementation of an algorithm to try to square polygons i.e when angles are quasi flat, or right, then try to make them really flat or right using least squares adjustment. Here we added a constraint to try to maintain alignment between polygons side by side in the list passed to the class
    Author:
    ILokhat

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SquareAlignPolygons(double rightTol, double flatTol, double semiRightTol)
      Constructor expecting tolerance in degrees for right angles and 45 degrees angles, and a tolerance for flat angles (in meters, 0 if completely flat)
      SquareAlignPolygons(double rightTol, double flatTol, double semiRightTol, double alignTol)
      Constructor expecting tolerance in degrees for right angles and 45 degrees angles, and a tolerance for flat angles (in meters, 0 if completely flat)
